sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <Form
      v-model:title="title"
      v-model:description="description"
      v-model:images="images"
    />
    <tempalte v-for="job in jobDetails" :key="job.id"
      ><Form
        v-model:title="job.title"
        v-model:description="job.description"
        v-model:images="job.images"
      />
    </tempalte>
    <v-btn @click="addJob">Add Job</v-btn>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script setup>
import { reactive, ref } from "vue";
import Form from "./Form.vue";
const title = ref("");
const description = ref("");
const images = ref([]);
const jobDetails = reactive([]);
const n = ref(0);
function addJob() {
  console.log(title.value, description.value, images.value);
  jobDetails.push({
    id: jobDetails.length + 1,
    title: title.value,
    description: description.value,
    images: images.value,
  });
}
</script>
<style></style>
